review_blob:
Im leaving this rating because no one else did:

S: Very intense smell. Vanilla and bourdon barrels (oak, vanilla, sweetness) hit you immediately, no finess here but still nice. Alcohol. almonds (due to oak/barrel?) Solvent (very deep in the nose)

A&T;: bitterness overwhelms sweetness, some banana, alcohol, same medical flavour (dont know if i like it), thime (lots of it)

P: alcohol, very fine carbonattion, long duration, some bitterness left, some herbal flavours linger (pine?/thime)

A: creamy head, orange/pink/peachy body color (not my normal lighting)

(thime, vanilla, barrels, solvent)
beer_name: White Pony The Prophet BA Bourbon 2013

review_blob: Pours gold to gold-orange. Smells like wet hops. Tastes coriander, hops, orange skin.  Little bit biter, lots of same orange aftertaste.
T: Sweet at first, definitely liquorice on a deeper taste, some lingering alcohol. A: dark no head. Ar: sweet.
Smells hoppy And citrus like. Tastes hoppy, little bit off orange, slightly sour, bit watery.

This beer needed some time to develop its flavour in the glass. first smell was malts, after some time I noticed a distinct herbal notes like you can find in thyme syrups. It looks pink when pouring, but is peachy orange in the glass. Tasted undefined at first bit sweet bit of malt, but after noticing the smell of herbs I could tasty those same herbs, some flavours I cant put my finger on. not a bad beer, but  wouldnt buy it again for the price it goes around here.

I have a cold so my smell is probably at bit of. I tried alvinnes kerasus and its not my taste and even though you can definitely smell and taste their sour cherry beer in this one I have to admit Im going to add this one to my cellar. Tastes like cherry slightly sparkling on the tong. Strongly influenced by the barrels that really add to this beer. Has a light aftertaste you only get from something like cointreau(marzipan, alcohol, nuts, ...) but lighter.
beer_name: Alvinne Beer Geek Wedding in London City

review_blob: Smells sweet, like grapefruit, hops immediately tastes like grapefruit balanced with the hops. Doesnt stock to the teeth but quite hoppy.  Move burned orange colour with nice almost white foam.
Nice licorice taste, bit of burned caramel. Smells like dark raisin (the kind the drown in rhum), coffee. Pours very dark with a very small head.
